sentences.literal: Now my lord's what is liked, is it drowned sound?'

sentences.chinese: 文侯曰：「敢問溺音者何從出也？」
sentences.literal: Duke Wen said: 'Dare ask drowned sound from what comes?'

sentences.chinese: 子夏答曰：「鄭音好濫淫志，宋音燕女溺志，衛音趣數煩志，齊音驁辟驕志，四者皆淫於色而害於德，是以祭祀不用也。
sentences.literal: Zi Xia replied saying: 'Zheng sound likes excess licentious will, Song sound banquet women drown will, Wei sound quick numerous trouble will, Qi sound arrogant heretical arrogant will; four all licentious in color and harm virtue, therefore sacrifices do not use them.
The Poetry says: 'Solemn harmonious harmonious calls, ancestors listen to this.'
Indeed respect with harmony, what matter not carried out?

sentences.chinese: 為人君者，謹其所好惡而已矣。
sentences.literal: Those who are rulers, be careful of what they like and dislike only.

sentences.chinese: 君好之則臣為之，上行之則民從之。
sentences.literal: Lord likes it then ministers do it, superiors practice it then people follow it.
The Poetry says: 'Guide people very easy', this is what is meant.

sentences.chinese: 然後聖人作為鞉鼓椌楬壎篪，此六者，德音之音也。
sentences.literal: Then sages made tao drum ju jie xun chi; these six, virtue sound's sounds.

sentences.chinese: 然後鐘磬竽瑟以和之，干戚旄狄以舞之。
sentences.literal: Then bells chimes yu se to harmonize them, shield axes banner flags to dance them.

sentences.chinese: 此所以祭先王之廟也，所以獻醻酳酢也，所以官序貴賤各得其宜也，此所以示後世有尊卑長幼序也。
sentences.literal: This is why sacrifice former kings' temples, why offer responses pledges exchanges; why official ranks noble base each get their appropriateness; this is why show later generations have noble base elder young order.
